item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: March 4, 2025 Today's Verse Philippians 2:13 [13] for it is God who works in you, both to will and to work for his good pleasure. Today's Memory Verse Matthew 11:28-30 - Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
